entry.title: WIND WARNING , Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:18 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 11.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saturna Island 8:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 then diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
